ing.item: Largish green or cooking apples (granny smith's or macintosh)

directions.step:
From: bankler@sheltie.ece.cmu.edu (Brian Bankler)
Date: 4 May 1994 14:42:36 GMT
Grease casserole dish. Peel and slice apples and put in dish (fill to below rim of dish). Combine sugar, flour, butter and crumble together with fork. On top of apples sprinkle cinnamon, cloves, water and lemon juice. Cover with topping. Bake 30 minutes at 375F.
REC.FOOD.RECIPES ARCHIVES
/DESSERTS
